comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
Our Deputy Director has spotted the Philips TV add on the right wall. Are we looking at 1956 onwards?

AB

comment.author: 86916510@N00
comment._content:
Good spotting DP. Classic photo of it's time. Not at peak hour for sure!

Do you have in your archives a shot of the portals of the city circle as they emerge toward central (before the carpark was built over it)?

It is to my mind a very ignored photo subject. Maybe it  was a bit of a no man's land and therefore not of any photo interest at the time until someone found a reason to cover it up with a car park?

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/highranger] Not that I know of. In terms of digitised State Rail images your bets bet is to look through this series in Photo Investigator. - AG investigator.records.nsw.gov.au/asp/photosearch/search.as...
